go_data.justification: Stx1 forms a four-helix bundle SNARE complex with SNAP-25 and VAMP-2, which provides the mechanical force for membrane fusion to occur.
SUMOylation of Stx1A regulates the rate of neurotransmitter vesicle endocytosis and affects synaptic vesicle exocytosis.
SUMOylation of Stx1A acts as a regulating factor that coordinates the balance between endo- and exocytosis at the presynapse.
Stx1A binds to SNAP-25, Munc18a, and VAMP-2 to form the SNARE complex.
Stx1A is anchored to the presynaptic membrane.
